title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it fails to take focus. Previously, it would gain focus upon being clicked. However, this behavior no longer occurs. Notably, if I manually drop down the combo list, it will successfully take focus.
OB: The first Combo in the application does not take focus when clicked on. It only takes focus if the combo list is manually dropped down.
EB: The first Combo in the application should take focus when clicked on, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Locate the first Combo. 3. Attempt to click on the first Combo and observe that it does not gain focus. To verify the expected behavior: 1. Open the application. 2. Locate the first Combo. 3. Click on the first Combo and verify that it successfully gains focus.
